name: mafl
tagline: A self-hosted feed and blog aggregator with a clean reading interface
description: Mafl is a self-hosted feed and blog aggregator similar to Feedly. It allows subscribing to RSS/Atom feeds, filtering stories, and reading articles via a simple responsive web interface.

features.title: Article Filtering
features.description: Create custom filters to show only relevant content based on keywords or sources

features.title: Mobile Responsive
features.description: Access your feeds from any device with a mobile-friendly, adaptive interface

features.title: Data Export
features.description: Migrate feed subscriptions easily from other readers using standard OPML format

features.title: Search and Filter
features.description: Find specific articles across all subscriptions using full-text search

features.title: Folder Organization
features.description: Group related feeds into folders for better content management
